description: Program crashed while I was just setting preferences.

Program is just what I am looking for, it looks up track, album artist information before rip.
However it does not initilise the drive to when selecting the extract option, either from the cd menu, or the user interface.

A few seconds after clicking on exctract in the cd menu program crashes.

I give it two stars simply because it obviously hasn't been debugged properly. 
However this program has potential. if someone can get it working.
It doesnt do anything at all....
